title: Any suggestions on a sexy paper for a bussiness(corperate)card?
content:
Something elegant.  
The card will be embossed and UV spotted.  
Kindly share your knowledge on sexy paper types
author: battlefield

comments.content: How about something translucent? Like a heavy vellum?

Yupo is pretty sexy. It comes in heavy translucent weights that resemble vellum but take embossing well and ar edamn near indestrictable.  
But being a non-porous paper-like polymer film, it requires special handling and not every printer is equiped for it.
